name: Flowing Flame
description: Each time your Diluc, who has this card equipped, uses Searing Onslaught for the second time in one Round, spend 1 less Pyro Die.
descriptionraw: Each time your $[A1301], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S13012]</color> for the second time in one Round, spend 1 less {SPRITE_PRESET#1103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro Die</color>.
descriptionreplaced: Each time your Diluc, who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>Searing Onslaught</color> for the second time in one Round, spend 1 less {SPRITE_PRESET#1103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro Die</color>.
